Title: Develop sideline occupations, increase earnings
Designer: Li Guangxue (李光学)Kong Xian'en (孔宪恩)
Publisher: Yunnan renmin chubanshe (云南人民出版社)
Notes: The texts on the two lanterns, in various ethnic minority scripts, form the title of the poster.
